attributes.action: introduce a UK Bank Holiday on Commonwealth Day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Commonwealth Day falls on the second Monday of March.

In the 9 months between August Bank Holiday and the May Day Bank Holiday we (Scotland excepted) have only 5 Bank Holidays.

St George's Day would be great and patriotic, but wouldn't apply to the whole country and lies between Easter and the May Day holiday, so is not best placed to break up Winter.

We have the fewest number of national holidays a year - only 8 Bank Holidays a year compared to the European average of 10.8.  Portugal and Spain have 14!

Please sign this to redress the balance.
